bridge-type.label: HUE Bridge
bridge-type.description: The hue Bridge represents the Philips hue bridge.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the hue bridge.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Name of a registered hue bridge user, that allows to access the API.

channel-type.label: HUE Lamp Color
channel-type.description: The color channel allows to control the color of the hue lamp. It is also possible to dim values and switch the lamp on and off.

channel-type.label: HUE Lamp Color Temperature
channel-type.description: The color temperature channel allows to set the color temperature from 0 (cold) to 100 (warm).
